question: Which one of the following Schedules of the Constitution of India contains provisions regarding Anti-Defection Act?
explanation: Anti-Defection Law is contained in the Tenth Schedule of the Constitution, which was introduced by the 52ndÂ Amendment in 1985 during tenure of Rajiv Gandhi.
